attributes.action: No more houses in Horsham and surrounding areas
attributes.additional_details: Horsham and the surrounding areas, such as Rusper and Crawley, are becoming increasingly over populated. And with more houses being built, it is not long before the area all merges in to one big city. Please, prevent more houses being built for as long as possible. There are many other areas which can be used around the country, why destory the beauty of villages such as Rusper and old towns such as Horsham?
